text: Artificial intelligence is a rapidly evolving field.
Machine learning is a subset of AI that focuses on algorithms.
Natural Language Processing (NLP) deals with language understanding.
Elasticsearch is a powerful open-source search and analytics engine.
Sentence Transformers generate embeddings for textual data.
LightGBM is a gradient boosting framework that uses tree-based learning algorithms.
FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+.
Hybrid search combines multiple search techniques for better relevance.
Big data analytics helps uncover hidden patterns and insights.
Deep learning models are often used in computer vision tasks.
